original: Eilertz, Emil Elias, redaktör, Göteborg, f. 13/4/82 i Linköp. G. 03 m. Ruth Andersson. Barn: Evert f. 05, elektr linig., an-st. v. Gbgs stads vat-tenv., Ebbe 07, anst. h. Blidberg, Met-calfe & Oo. i Gbg, Bonja 08, g. m. dir. O. Wickmian i firma C. B. Gedda A-B i Gbg. — Medarb. i tidn. östgöten 97-03, red:sekr., sederm. red. o. utg. av Oskarshamns-Bladet 03-09, redisekr. i Hallands-Posten 09-17, medarb. i Gbgs-Posten 17-18, lokalchef i Gbgs Dag’blad 18-21, red. o. utg. av Nyaste Extrabiadet i Gbg 21, medarb. i Gbgs-Tidn. sed. 25. Led. av Publikl., många år styr:led. i des^s v. krets, lied. av Sv. journ :fören., några år ’s^tyr :iled. i dess Gbgs-krets. Sign.: Jonn, -dl-, Sciopti-kon, Ezäta, Teoifil, Skrivare-Lars.
translated: Eilertz, Emil Elias, editor, Gothenburg, born April 13, 1882 in Linköping. Married in 1903 to Ruth Andersson. Children: Evert born in 1905, electric line worker, employed by Gothenburg city water supply, Ebbe born in 1907, employed by Blidberg, Metcalfe & Co. in Gothenburg, and Bonja born in 1908, married to director O. Wickman of the firm C. B. Gedda AB in Gothenburg. Worked as a contributor for the newspaper Östgöten from 1897-1903, served as secretary, later editor and publisher of Oskarshamns-Bladet from 1903-1909, served as editorial secretary at Hallands-Posten from 1909-1917, contributed to Gbgs-Posten from 1917-1918, was a local manager at Gbgs Dag'blad from 1918-1921, edited and published Nyaste Extrabiadet in Gothenburg in 1921, and contributed to Gbgs-Tidn. since 1925. Member of the Publicity Committee for many years and served on its governing board, member of the Swedish Journalists Association, served for several years on the committee of the association's Gothenburg branch. Signature: Jonn, -dl-, Sciopti-kon, Ezäta, Teoifil, Skrivare-Lars.

spouse.name: O. Wickman
spouse.employer: C. B. Gedda AB in Gothenburg
